alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene, northeastern Lenoir, northwestern Craven and south central Pitt Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ormondsville, or 7 miles southwest of Ayden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Kinston, Ayden, Grifton, Calico, Shelmerdine, Black Jack, Graingers, Ormondsville, Roundtree, Hookerton and Gardnerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
